articles.title: Foreign broking houses cut down target prices of these stocks. Do you own any of them? - Moneycontrol
articles.description: ICICI Prudential Life Insurance Company, HDFC Bank, Jindal Steel & Power, ACC, Hindustan Zinc, Tata Consultancy Services and Oberoi Realty are among the stocks in which foreign broking houses cut the target price.

articles.author: Suvil Susvirkar
articles.title: BMW G310 RR: What else can you buy? - BikeWale
articles.description: Here we list the alternatives that potential buyers can consider in the same price range.
articles.content: BMW Motorrad has announced the launch of its third G310-series motorcycle, the G310 RR in the Indian market. This motorcycle is the rebadged version of the TVS Apache RR310 and it uses the exact same… [+3263 chars]
